description: A budget-friendly, meal-prep-focused bulking plan hitting 3,065 calories and 230g protein daily using just 5 repeated meals. Designed for a beginner cook with a small appetite, all ingredients from Coles Australia. Nutrition data verified against USDA FoodData Central. Prices estimated from multiple Australian sources as of February 2026.

prep_session_guide.title: Preheat oven and prep chicken
prep_session_guide.description: Preheat oven to 200°C (fan-forced 180°C). Line a large baking tray with baking paper. Lay out all chicken breast fillets (the 500g from your fridge plus the 1.4kg purchased — total ~1.9kg raw). Drizzle with 1 tablespoon olive oil, season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Place in oven and set timer for 25 minutes.

items.item_name: Coles RSPCA Chicken Breast Fillets (Large Pack)
items.notes: Approx $12/kg. You also have 500g at home (cook immediately — expiring today). Total chicken for the week: ~1.9kg raw.

instructions: Combine 70g rolled oats and 250ml full cream milk in a large microwave-safe bowl.
Microwave on high for 2.5–3 minutes, stirring once halfway through to prevent overflow.
meals.notes: Small appetite tip: Blend all ingredients raw with 4–5 ice cubes for a 770-calorie drinkable shake instead.
